info.description: This is a sample server for MMA backend.
info.title: MMA Backend API

post.description: Authenticates a user and returns a JWT token.
Logs out the user and invalidates their refresh token.

get.description: Retrieves details for the currently authenticated user.

post.description: Refreshes an access token using a valid refresh token provided as an HttpOnly cookie.

get.description: Retrieves a list of all available currencies

post.description: Adds a new currency to the system (admin operation)

get.description: Retrieves details for a specific currency by its 3-letter code
Retrieves all available exchange rates

post.description: Adds a new exchange rate between two currencies for a specific date

400.description: Invalid input format or validation error

get.description: Retrieves multiple exchange rates by their unique identifiers
get.summary: Get multiple exchange rates by their IDs

get.description: Retrieves all exchange rates for a specific currency
Retrieves an exchange rate by its unique identifier
Retrieves the latest exchange rate for a given currency pair

post.description: Exchange authorization code for access token
post.summary: Exchange authorization code for access token

500.description: Failed to exchange authorization code for access token

get.description: Lists all API tokens for the authenticated user. Only returns token metadata, not the actual token values.

post.description:
Creates a new API token for the authenticated user. The token will be shown only once upon creation.
The token can be used for API authentication by including it in the Authorization header as: `Authorization: Bearer <token>`

delete.description:
Revokes all API tokens for the authenticated user. This will immediately invalidate all tokens.
A new token will need to be generated for API access after this operation.

Revokes a specific API token by ID. The token will be immediately invalidated.
Only the token owner can revoke their own tokens.

get.description: Retrieves a list of users (potentially admin only)
Retrieves details for a specific user by their ID

403.description: Forbidden (trying to access another user's details)

put.description: Updates a user's details (currently only name)

delete.description: Marks a user as deleted (soft delete)

get.description: Retrieves a list of workplaces the authenticated user belongs to.

post.description: Creates a new workplace and assigns the creator as admin.

get.description: Retrieves a list of accounts for the specified workplace if the user is a member.
get.summary: List accounts for current user in workplace

post.description: Creates a new account within the specified workplace.

400.description: Invalid input or missing Workplace ID

403.description: Forbidden (User cannot create in this workplace)

get.description: Retrieves details for a specific account by its ID within a workplace.
get.summary: Get account by ID from workplace

404.description: Account not found in this workplace

put.description: Updates details for a specific account within a workplace.

404.description: Account not found in this workplace

delete.description: Marks an account as inactive within a specified workplace.

404.description: Account not found in this workplace

get.description: Retrieves a paginated list of transactions associated with a specific account within a workplace.
get.summary: List transactions for an account in a workplace

400.description: Missing Workplace/Account ID or invalid query params

404.description: Account not found in this workplace

post.description: Marks a workplace as active (requires admin permission).
Marks a workplace as inactive (requires admin permission).

get.description: Retrieves a list of journals for the specified workplace if the user is a member.
get.summary: List journals for current user in workplace

parameters.description: Whether to include reversed and reversing journals
parameters.name: includeReversals

parameters.description: Whether to include transactions in the response
parameters.name: includeTxn

post.description: Creates a new journal entry within the specified workplace.
post.summary: Create a new journal in workplace

400.description: Invalid input or missing Workplace ID

403.description: Forbidden (User cannot create in this workplace)

get.description: Retrieves details for a specific journal entry by its ID within a workplace.
get.summary: Get a journal by ID from workplace

404.description: Journal not found in this workplace

put.description: Updates details (like description, date) for a specific journal entry within a workplace.
put.summary: Update a journal entry in workplace

404.description: Journal not found in this workplace

post.description: Reverses a specific journal entry by creating a new journal with opposite transaction types.
post.summary: Reverse a journal entry in workplace

200.description: The newly created reversing journal entry

404.description: Journal not found in this workplace

409.description: Conflict (e.g., journal already reversed or not posted)

get.description: Generates a balance sheet report as of a specific date
Generates a profit and loss report for a specific period
Generates a trial balance report as of a specific date
Retrieves a list of users and their roles in the specified workplace.

post.description: Adds a specified user to a workplace with a given role (requires admin permission).
post.summary: Add a user to a workplace

put.description: Updates a user's role in a workplace (requires admin permission)
put.summary: Update a user's role in a workplace

delete.description: Removes a user from a workplace (requires admin permission)
delete.summary: Remove a user from a workplace

x-enum-comments.RoleReadOnly: Users with read-only access to workplace data
x-enum-comments.RoleRemoved: For users who have been removed from the workplace

x-enum-descriptions: Users with read-only access to workplace data
For users who have been removed from the workplace

balance.description: Balance is not typically included directly; might be a separate endpoint or calculation

parentAccountID.description: Optional, must be UUID if provided

transactionDate.description: Optional, defaults to journal date if not provided

amount.description: Total movement amount in the journal

nextToken.description: Token to fetch the next page
Token to fetch the next page

name.description: Only name is updatable for now

email.description: Pointer to allow null/omitted if not set

handlers.APIErrorResponse.description: Generic error response containing a message describing the error This is used for all error responses in the API

BearerAuth.description: Type "Bearer" followed by a space and JWT token.
BearerAuth.name: Authorization
